lead_paragraph: India will play two Twenty20 internationals against world champions West Indies in Florida in late August, the Indian cricket board (BCCI) said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: India and West Indies to Play T20 Games in United States
headline.main: India and West Indies to Play T20 Games in United States
